column4: Hi, I think I had trashed my entire system. How do I reinstall Linux from cmd line?
I dont have cd, Do I need to redo the USB thing again?
you have the iso on computer?
I do not know. How do I find out?
kinda hoping you had saved it to the hdd.  If not, download the iso, make a usb/cdrom and reinstall.
Anyone have a link to a good explanation about reinstalling linux with a USB device?
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/FromUSBStick
I dont have Windows, how do I get into the boot menu?
windows has nothing to do with bios.  During initial boot, you'll see "press *some Key* for boot options.
Ok, I will try that cfhowlett, thanks
Hi, I was just in here talking about how to get into my BIOS. I restarted my machine and there was no "press this or that to get into BIOS" prompt. How the heck do I get into the BIOS?
what's your computer make/model?
Its an ACER netbook
more info?  model #?
how do I find that out?
read the labels?  look under the battery?
Its actually a Lenova Ideadpad.
looks like F2 might bring up bios.  reboot and hit f2 after the beep
I cant really look under it because it has so many wires running into it right now
wait 1
its got an atom processor
its pretty old. probably 2 years old
tell you what, reboot, hit F2.  doesn't work, reboot hit F3.  Eventually you'll get the bios menu
